description: Details required by condition 6 (submission of details - (a) Detailed section and elevation drawings of the replacement windows (at scale 1:5 or 1:10), showing glazing type and thickness.) of planning permission 23/08482 (Replacement of roof covering and water tank, installations of AOVs, replacement black metal railings at front of roof terrace and additional railings to rear, installation of timber decking, replacement of composite access hatches with box rooflights associated with use of flat roofs as external amenity spaces for residents, replacement of single glazed windows with timber framed double glazed windows, and associated works.)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
